QueryResult.text: SELECT DISTINCT CMN_SEC_PERM_ELEMENTS.PERMISSION_CODE, CMN_SEC_PERM_ELEMENTS.PERMISSION_VALUE, CMN_SEC_RIGHT.OBJECT_ID, CMN_SEC_RIGHT.RIGHT_ID, CMN_SEC_RIGHT.RIGHT_TYPE, CMN_SEC_RIGHT.RIGHT_OBS_TYPE, CMN_SEC_PERM_ELEMENTS.ID PE_ID FROM CMN_SEC_PERM_ELEMENTS, CMN_SEC_RIGHT WHERE CMN_SEC_RIGHT.PERMISSION_ID = CMN_SEC_PERM_ELEMENTS.PERMISSION_ID AND CMN_SEC_RIGHT.IS_ACTIVE = 1
